HP resources for VMware

General resources

  • HP virtualization with VMware - This is the main page about VMware in the HP site. It has dozens of links to White Papers, webinars, podcasts and other HP sites about VMware.
  • HP and VMware Virtualization Alliance - The HP-VMware Alliance page in the VMware site. It has several areas that outline the different HP-VMware joint solutions.
  • VMware Enterprise Library at HP – Case studies, White Papers and Datasheets.
  • HP Insight Control for VMware vCenter Server
  • HP Virtualization Smart Bundles with VMware
  • HP VirtualSystem for VMware - Main portal of HP VirtualSystem solution
  • HP VirtualSystem VS1 for VMware
  • HP VirtualSystem VS2 for VMware
  • HP VirtualSystem VS3 for VMware
  • HP Software Releases & Media- Information about VMware products OEM licensing from HP
  • VMware vSphere from HP QuickSpecs
  • HP VMware Transition Matrix
  • December 2012 VMware SmartComponents for Insight Control for vCenter

VMware on ProLiant

  • ProLiant server VMware support matrix - This page is the Rosetta Stone for every VMware installation on HP hardware. It has every HP Proliant Blade/Server cross-referenced in a table with every ESX/ESXi version from the 2.1 to the 4.1. The vSphere tab it also has a column about VMware FT support.
  • VMware demos in HP hardware – This site has a few interesting videos demoing VMware products in HP hardware.
  • HP ESX 4.x images for the G7 ProLiant Blades.
  • HP ESXi 4.x customized images
  • HP sizing tool for Vmware vSphere
  • HP Management Agents for ESX 4.x
  • HP Virtual Connect Flex-10 and VMware vSphere 4.0
  • Cisco Nexus 1000V on HP BladeSystem
  • Virtual Connect FlexFabric Cookbook - One the famous Virtual Connect cookbooks, contains a lot of ‘recipes’ with examples using VMware vSphere.
  • HP Virtual Connect FlexFabric and VMware vSphere 4
  • HP Virtual Connect FelxFabric Solution Recipe - With links to the firmware and driver downloads for ESX(i) 4.1
  • HP Virtual Connect Flex-10 NICs Solution Recipe
  • Deploying a VMware vSphere HA Cluster with HP Virtual Connect FlexFabric
  • Using HP Virtual Connect on HP BladeSystem c-Class with VMware Infrastructure 3.5
  • Driver Versions in HP supplied VMware ESX/ESXi images
  • HP BladeSystem Matrix How-To Guide: ESX Host Provisioning
  • June 2012 VMware FW and Software Recipe
  • September 2012 VMware FW and Software Recipe
  • October 2012 VMware FW and Software Recipe
  • February 2013 VMware FW and Software Recipe
  • HP Remote System Management for VMware
  • HP ESXi 5.0 customized images
  • HP ESXi 5.0U1 customized ISO
  • HP ESXi 5.0U2 customized ISO
  • HP ESXi 5.1 customized ISO
  • HP custom ESXi images for ProLiant servers - Technology brief, 2nd Ed.
  • HP Vibsdepot - Software repository by HP with bundles compatible with VMware Image Builder,esxcli and VMware Update Manager
  • Deploying and updating VMware vSphere 5.0 on HP ProLiant servers - Integration note 3rd Edition
  • Upgrading VMware vCenter Server and VMware ESX in an HP Insight Dynamics 4.1 or 6.0 environment
  • HP VMware ESXi management environment
  • HP VMware Utilities User Guide VMware ESXi 5.0 U1 for October 2012
  • HP VMware Utilities User Guide VMware vSphere 5.1 for October 2012
  • HP VMware ESXi 4.0 and Updates Getting Started Guide
  • HP VMware ESXi 4.1 and Updates Getting Started Guide
  • HP VMware ESXi and vSphere 5.X and Updates Getting Started Guide
  • HP VMware ESXi 5.0 U1 and Updates Getting Started Guide for June 2012
  • HP VMware Utilities User Guide VMware ESXi 5.0 for March 2012
  • HP Insight Management WBEM Providers for ESXi 5.0 U1 October 2012 - SNMP Data Migration - V1.2
  • HP Insight Management WBEM Providers for VMware vSphere 5.1 October 2012 - SNMP Data Migration - V1.2
  • HP Insight Management WBEM Providers for HP integrated VMware ESXi 5.0 U1 - Oct 2012 Datasheets

HP Storage

  • VMware Storage Solutions from HP – Includes the ESX/ESXi 3.x and 4.x support matrices for HP Storage systems.
  • Running VMware vSphere 4 on HP LeftHand P4000 SAN Solutions – Excellent White Paper, a must for every VMware-Lefthand infrastructure.
  • Configuration best practices for HP Enterprise Virtual Array family VMware vSphere 4 and 4.1
  • Best practices for VMware ESX 3.5, using c-Class Blades, EVA and Virtual Connect
  • Best Practices for VMware ESX 3.5 using c-Class Blades, MSA2000, and Virtual Connect
  • HP XP24000 and vSphere 4 best practices
  • VMware vCenter Plug-in for HP StorageWorks Arrays – Great video by Calvin Zito (@HPStorareGuy)
  • HP P4000 VAAI demo - Video of the demo showed at VMworld 2010 San Francisco.
  • HP Storage drivers – Including the virtualization adapters for VMware SRM for EVA, XP and P4000 systems
  • HP P4000 VSA – Product page of my beloved VSA :-)
  • HP P6000 EVA Arrays with HP BladeSystem and VMware vSphere
  • HP P6000 Enterprise Virtual Array for VMware
  • HP Storage P9000 Configuration Guide - P9500 Disk Array - Includes a section for VMware vSphere.
  • VMware podcast recap - Recopilation of all the podcasts recorded about the new vSphere 5.0 and HP storage by my HP fellow vExpert Calvin Zito (@HPStorageGuy)
  • P4000 SRA for VMware SRM User Guide
  • HP P2000 Software Plug-in for VMware VAAI
  • HP P2000 Software Plug-in for VMware VAAI vSphere 4.1 - Software Download
  • HP P2000 Software Plug-in for VMware VAAI vSphere 5.0 - Software Download
  • Configuration best practices for deploying VMware vSphere 4.1 on the HP P2000 G3 MSA Array combo controller
  • Complete storage and data protection architecture for VMware vSphere
  • Optimizing VMware protection with HP and Veeam
  • Backup and recovery best practices for the HP EVA array in a VMware environment using HP Data Protector
  • HP 3PAR Management Software Plug-In for VMware VAAI

VDI

  • HP Client Virtualization – HP main site about VDI, not exclusively about VMware but very intersting.
  • HP Virtual Desktop Infrastructure with VMware View – HP VDI solution with VMware View main site.

  • HP Cloud Map with BladeSystem Matrix for VMware vCloud Director – A demo showing what can be done by combining the HP Matrix and the awesome vCloud Director.
